languages.text: "Ситуация только что стала... сложнее. Как мы из нее выйдем?"
"The situation has just become... complicated. How are we going to resolve it?"
languages.original_text: "Ситуация только что стала... сложнее. Как мы из нее выйдем?"

traits.locale_text: "The situation has just become... complicated. How are we going to solve it?"

"The situation has just become... complicated. How are we going to resolve it?"
"The situation has just become... complicated. How are we going to resolve it?"

languages.text: « La situation vient de se... compliquer. Comment allons-nous résoudre ça ? »
languages.original_text: "The situation has just become... complicated. How are we going to resolve it?"

traits.locale_text: « La situation vient de se... compliquer. Comment allons-nous résoudre ça ? »

languages.text: «La situación acaba de volverse... complicada. ¿Cómo la resolvemos?».
languages.original_text: "The situation has just become... complicated. How are we going to resolve it?"

traits.locale_text: «La situación acaba de volverse... complicada. ¿Cómo la resolvemos?».

languages.text: “鉴于情况变得……这么复杂，我们该怎么解决这个问题？”
languages.original_text: "The situation has just become... complicated. How are we going to resolve it?"

traits.locale_text: “鉴于情况变得……这么复杂，我们该怎么解决这个问题？”

languages.text: 「状況は今まさに…複雑化している。どうやって解決すべきだろうか？」
languages.original_text: "The situation has just become... complicated. How are we going to resolve it?"

traits.locale_text: 「状況は今まさに…複雑化している。どうやって解決すべきだろうか？」

languages.text: "Die Lage ist gerade etwas ... kompliziert geworden. Wie wollen wir das lösen?"
languages.original_text: "The situation has just become... complicated. How are we going to resolve it?"
